\end{DoxyParamCaption}

Constructs a test logger interface. 

By default the logger has no defined outputs.

Adds a standard output for writing. 

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
Currently writing to only one standard output is supported. Calling this function multiple times will result in an exception. T\+O\+D\+O\+:
\end{DoxyWarning}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em format} & The format to write standard output in. \\
\hline

\hypertarget{classchaos_1_1test_1_1_test_logger_a95a0c9aa1345a94f84e41caa71e6e8ab}{}\index{chaos\+::test\+::\+Test\+Logger@{chaos\+::test\+::\+Test\+Logger}!set\+\_\+as\+\_\+parent@{set\+\_\+as\+\_\+parent}}
\index{set\+\_\+as\+\_\+parent@{set\+\_\+as\+\_\+parent}!chaos\+::test\+::\+Test\+Logger@{chaos\+::test\+::\+Test\+Logger}}
\subsubsection[{set\+\_\+as\+\_\+parent(bool state)}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}void chaos\+::test\+::\+Test\+Logger\+::set\+\_\+as\+\_\+parent (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{bool}]{state}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}\label{classchaos_1_1test_1_1_test_logger_a95a0c9aa1345a94f84e41caa71e6e8ab}


Sets this logger as the parent logger. 

There should be only one parent logger. The parent logger will merge in any sub logs made child processes and will also handle actions like opening and closing the log. 

The documentation for this class was generated from the following file\+:\begin{DoxyCompactItemize}
